Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipfitAdminServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipfitAdminService
public interface FlipfitAdminServiceInterface
Author: JEDI-Group D - Flipkart Development This interface defines the operations for admin management, including approval of gym owners and customers, and retrieving information about gyms and users.

  • Method Details

    • approveGymOwner

      Object approveGymOwner(String gymOwnerId)
      Approves a gym owner by their ID.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - The ID of the gym owner to be approved.
      Returns:
      An object indicating the approval status.

    • viewPendingGymOwners

      List<FlipFitGymOwner> viewPendingGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of gym owners awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      A list of pending gym owners.

    • viewPendingGyms

      List<FlipFitGyms> viewPendingGyms()
      Retrieves a list of gyms that are pending approval.
      Returns:
      A list of pending gyms.

    • login

      Boolean login(String username, String password)
      Validates the login credentials of an admin.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin.
      password - The password of the admin.
      Returns:
      True if the login is successful, false otherwise.

    • getAllCustomers

      List<FlipFitCustomer> getAllCustomers()

      Returns:
